content: चरणः --णं [चर्-करणे ल्युट्] {@--1@} A foot; शिरसि चरण एष न्यस्यते वारयैनं <ls>Ve. 3. 38</ls>; जात्या काममवध्योसि चरण त्विदमुद्धृतं <ls n="Ve. 3.">39.</ls> {@--2@} A support, pillar, prop. {@--3@} The root of a tree. {@--4@} The single line of a stanza. {@--5@} A quarter. {@--6@} A school or branch of any of the Vedas; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} चरणगुरवः <ls>Mv. 1</ls>, <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 3.</ls> {@--7@} A race. {@--8@} (In prosody) A dactyl. --णः {@--1@} A foot-soldier. {@--2@} A ray of light. --णं {@--1@} Moving, roaming, wandering. {@--2@} Performance, practising; <ls>Ms. 6. 75.</ls> {@--3@} Conduct of life, behaviour (moral). {@--4@} Accomplishment. {@--5@} Eating, consuming. {@--6@} Course. {@--7@} Acting, dealing, managing, conduct. {@--8@} Fixed observance of any class, age (as priesthood &c).

चरणः --णं [चर्-करणे ल्युट्] {@--1@} A foot; शिरसि चरण एष न्यस्यते वारयैनं <ls>Ve. 3. 38</ls>; जात्या काममवध्योसि चरण त्विदमुद्धृतं <ls n="Ve. 3.">39.</ls> {@--2@} A support, pillar, prop. {@--3@} The root of a tree. {@--4@} The single line of a stanza. {@--5@} A quarter. {@--6@} A school or branch of any of the Vedas; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} चरणगुरवः <ls>Mv. 1</ls>, <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 3.</ls> {@--7@} A race. {@--8@} (In prosody) A dactyl. --णः {@--1@} A foot-soldier. {@--2@} A ray of light. --णं {@--1@} Moving, roaming, wandering. {@--2@} Performance, practising; <ls>Ms. 6. 75.</ls> {@--3@} Conduct of life, behaviour (moral). {@--4@} Accomplishment. {@--5@} Eating, consuming. {@--6@} Course. {@--7@} Acting, dealing, managing, conduct. {@--8@} Fixed observance of any class, age (as priesthood &c).
